extendedInfo.description: Royal Revolt is a brand new reverse T-defense game with beautiful 3D graphics and intuitive touch controls! Lead your soldiers to victory against your greedy relatives who have stolen your fatherâs throne.âââââ How to play ââââââ¢ Use the simple touch controls to direct your troopsâ¢ Employ battle magic to heal, stun or destroyâ¢ Upgrade your hero, knights and spellsâ¢ Conquer all 58 castles to become Kingâââââ The story so far âââââYou are a young Prince, sent by your father to learn magic at Bogsmarts, a boarding school for the spoilt and untalented aristocrat youth.When you return after two years with a B.A. in Petty Magic, all has changed in your fatherâs land:Your father has died and your ugly aunts and uncles have carved up the Kingdom among them. You throw a tantrum, but to no avail: your relatives suggest you go back to school and leave politics to the grown-ups.But you are a man now! You sell your jeweled teddy bear, collect a few trusty soldiers and set out to KICK THE GREEDY BUSTARDS out of their castles.Which are rightfully YOUR castles, damn it! âââââ Press quotes ââââââPart melee action, part on-the-fly tactics, Royal Revolt!âs gameplay is the perfect example of walking the razorâs edge between new tricks and old staples.â (148apps.com)âRoyal Revolt is a gem giving you a full game experience for free.â (Touchgen.net)âRoyal Revolt! is a must get, you really canât go wrong with trying out this game.â (Gamerchica.com)

reviews.title: Need update
reviews.comment: Need update.first play its okay.but next play the game just wont open???always...the game looks great but if i can\'t play it dissapointed...(samsung galaxy s2 running on jelly bean 4.1.1)
reviews.author: didik sudiyanto

reviews.title: Red crystals
reviews.comment: I will rate excellent when I get the red crystals that I am owed. I previously completed the game ma ny levels with 3 stars and then you brought out the update where for every earnt star you get 1 red crystal.  I assumed that I would automatically get my red crystals. But no. Even if I try to reply a level I don\'t get any crystals
reviews.author: Mark Ryan

reviews.title: Mini Warcraft
reviews.comment: It\'s like a tower pushing game with skills of the lead character and armies like Warcraft on my tab.For that I give you 5 stars good job!!!
reviews.author: James Edward Losanta

reviews.title: Great But !...
reviews.comment: I\'ve lost my saving point ,gold and gems ! For no reason ! I will rate 5 stars when I get my data back . The rest is Great and amazing game
reviews.author: Keem Soz

reviews.title: Beh
reviews.comment: Kinda fun but every time I use crystals to pay for an upgrade it uses all of my gold as well....I am out not just all the crystals but at least 45k in gold.   Why do I have to double pay
reviews.author: David Blotter

reviews.title: Awesome Game ! But ...
reviews.comment: I bought every package of crystals, but till now they are not bieng shown, and even when I tap on a gem package after I already bought the other ones, nothing happens, PLZ do something about it, I am out of gems and I need them. And the worst part is that I lost my save, so everything was back as if I just downladed it
reviews.author: Jamal Zaghmout

reviews.title: Upset
reviews.comment: Once I update the latest update required. I can\'t play the game till now. Please fix I want to play this further. Otherwise, I will just uninstall it.

reviews.title: Best Game ever seen...
